General.Name: Fujian Cosunter Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Cosunter Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of pharmaceutical products in China. It offers medicines for anti-HBV, liver diseases, digestive, respiratory, cardiovascular, men's health, and other fields. The company primarily produces crude drug and solid preparation in the forms of tablet, capsule, granule, medicinal tea, etc. Fujian Cosunter Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.
